name: EMBEJEAL
description:
EMBEJEAL is a platformer where you can not delay the inevitable : your life.

Your healthbar loose constantly health - you can collect hearts to increase health.

HEARTS give you 4 healthpoint.

However - there are some actions which multiply the loose of health (like climbing). Also every jump takes some of your health too.

Oh and you can shoot daggers but this costs you also 1 HP.

So be careful how you moove. Idea by my 10 year old son and me.

All Assets are made by myself.
